name: Asteroids (itch) (kenndox)
description:
This is my first Game Maker project, an Asteroids spinoff game.

It includes a ship, some asteroids and powerups that help you achieve better scores.

The goal is simple, to beat your own high score. 

Your ship starts with 4 lives which are shown as 4 rectangles next to it, but you can regain those with random powerup drops.

CONTROLS:

  • W: move forwards
  • A: spin left
  • D: spin right
  • Space/left mouse: shoot
  • ESC: exits to main menu

Enjoy!
